title: Latest WhatsApp update brings rich document previews
content:
WhatsApp is one of the best instant messaging apps out there, and while it’s not as feature-packed and powerful as Telegram, it’s always getting better with new improvements and features. Case in point: WhatsApp is rolling out a new update that brings improved document previews. As spotted by WABetainfo, WhatsApp is rolling out a new

The post Latest WhatsApp update brings rich document previews appeared first on xda-developers.
description: With the latest WhatsApp beta update, WhatsApp now displays a rich preview, giving you a glimpse of the content inside.
